perturbation.original_text: Section 3.07  [Procedures]. Procedures. The services to be provided by PrimeCall in accordance with this Article III  [Services Provided by PrimeCall] shall be provided to DeltaThree in accordance with reasonable procedures for operation and may be changed from time to time if agreed upon by each of PrimeCall and DeltaThree.
perturbation.changed_text: Section 3.07  [Procedures]. Procedures. The services to be provided by PrimeCall in accordance with this Article III  [Services Provided by PrimeCall] shall be provided to DeltaThree in accordance with reasonable procedures for operation and may be changed from time to time at PrimeCall's sole discretion, without requiring DeltaThree's consent.
perturbation.explanation: Originally, Section 3.07 stated that PrimeCall and DeltaThree must agree on any changes to the operational procedures for PrimeCall's services. The modified version contradicts this by granting PrimeCall the unilateral right to change these procedures without DeltaThree's approval, creating uncertainty about DeltaThree's control over the services they receive.

perturbation.original_text: Section 9.09  [Assignment]. Assignment. This Agreement shall be binding upon and inure to the benefit of the parties hereto and their respective successors and permitted assigns. This Agreement may not be assigned by DeltaThree without the prior written consent of PrimeCall. PrimeCall may assign this Agreement to any affiliate of PrimeCall or in connection with a merger or consolidation of PrimeCall or a sale of all or substantially all of PrimeCall's business. Except as provided in the preceding sentence, this Agreement may not be assigned by PrimeCall without the prior written consent of DeltaThree.
perturbation.changed_text: Section 9.09  [Assignment]. Assignment. This Agreement shall be binding upon and inure to the benefit of the parties hereto and their respective successors and permitted assigns. This Agreement may be assigned by DeltaThree at will and without notifying Primecall. PrimeCall may assign this Agreement to any affiliate of PrimeCall or in connection with a merger or consolidation of PrimeCall or a sale of all or substantially all of PrimeCall's business. Except as provided in the preceding sentence, this Agreement may not be assigned by PrimeCall without the prior written consent of DeltaThree.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause states that DeltaThree needs PrimeCall's consent to assign the agreement. The modified clause directly contradicts this by stating that DeltaThree can assign the agreement 'at will and without notifying PrimeCall.' This creates a direct conflict and uncertainty regarding assignment rights.

perturbation.original_text: Section 9.10  [Publicity; Announcements]. Publicity; Announcements. Except to the extent required by law, all publicity related to the transactions contemplated hereby shall be subject to the mutual approval of the parties hereto and, except as otherwise may be required by law, no public announcement of any of the transactions contemplated hereby will be made by either party hereto without the prior written consent of the other party hereto, which consent shall not be unreasonably withheld.
perturbation.changed_text: Section 9.10  [Publicity; Announcements]. Publicity; Announcements. Except to the extent required by law, all publicity related to the transactions contemplated hereby shall be determined by each party independent of any approval from the other party; furthermore, either party may issue any public announcement regarding this agreement and the transactions contemplated herein without the consent of the other party.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause required mutual approval for all publicity and announcements related to the agreement. The modified version explicitly states that publicity and announcements can be determined independently by each party without the other's consent, creating a contradiction and uncertainty around the control of public communication.
